attributes.action: Force councils to carry out the decent homes guidelines even on homes within the conservation areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To force councils to carry out the decent homes guidelines on homes in conservation areas, who are left out by way of pvc double glazing. Councils will not provide alternative means of double glazing as they are not forced to. This means that the decent homes money being allocated to councils is not used for double glazing on the homes in conservation areas, where is the money going? Alternative means of double glazing should be provided by councils, especially in these credit cruch times, where heating is astronomical, and the weather is cold.
